  • Classes in lexa.core.data.formatting used by lexa.core.data.formatting 
    Class and Description
    BooleanFormat
    Helper for serialising Boolean values.
    CombinedDateTimeFormat
    Helper for serialising Date values as dates, times or both.
    DateTimeFormat
    Helper for serialising the date and time values for a Date object.
    DoubleFormat
    Helper for serialising Double values.
    Format
    An interface for the classes that provide formatting for serialising and deserialising data.
    IntegerFormat
    Helper for serialising Integer values.
    LongFormat
    Helper for serialising Long values.
    StringFormat
    Helper for serialising String values.
